description: Number of prime factors of 10^n - 1 (counted with multiplicity).
comments: a(n) = Omega(10^n -1) = Omega(R_n) + 2 = A046053(n) + 2 {where Omega(n)=A001222(n) and R_n=(10^n -1)/9=A002275(n)}. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jun 09 2006
